str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable. Probably from ago; deserving, comparable or suitable.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural

str2: With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
